CorruptTheSpire:CorruptedForm.NAME: Corrupted Form
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, deal damage equal to #b{0}% #yCorruption to ALL enemies.

CorruptTheSpire:FatedCard.NAME: Fated Card
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your next turn, add a random #yCommon card to your hand.
At the start of your next turn, add a random #yUncommon card to your hand.
At the start of your next turn, add a random #yRare card to your hand.
At the start of your turn #b{0} turns from now, add a random #yCommon card to your hand.
At the start of your turn #b{0} turns from now, add a random #yUncommon card to your hand.
At the start of your turn #b{0} turns from now, add a random #yRare card to your hand.

CorruptTheSpire:ShimmeringShield.NAME: Shimmering Shield
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card of a different color, deal #b{0} damage to ALL enemies and gain #b{0} Block.

CorruptTheSpire:DragonsHeart.NAME: Dragon's Heart
DESCRIPTIONS: When this enemy dies, all other enemies gain #b{0} #yStrength and #b{0} #yMetallicize.

CorruptTheSpire:DevilsDue.NAME: Devil's Due
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, move all cards other than #yBasics, #yCommons, and #yCurses to the discard pile, then add #b{0} #yBedeviled to your draw pile.
At the start of combat, move all cards other than #yBasics, #yCommons, and #yCurses to the discard pile, then add #b{0} #yBedeviled to your draw and discard piles.

CorruptTheSpire:PriceOfKnowledge.NAME: Price of Knowledge
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a card other than your initial cards for each turn, discard a card. If your hand becomes empty, you cannot draw cards this turn.

CorruptTheSpire:TormentingShackles.NAME: Tormenting Shackles
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a card, #b{0}% chance to increase its cost by #b1 this turn.

CorruptTheSpire:BlackOmen.NAME: Black Omen
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, apply #b{0} #yAbysstouched to ALL enemies.

CorruptTheSpire:NightmareKnowledge.NAME: Nightmare Knowledge
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a corrupted card, draw #b1 card.
Whenever you draw a corrupted card, draw #b{0} cards.

CorruptTheSpire:NightmareDefense.NAME: Nightmare Defense
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a corrupted card, gain #b{0} Block.

CorruptTheSpire:Abysstouched.NAME: Abysstouched
DESCRIPTIONS: Take #b{0}% more damage from #yAttacks. At the end of your turn, take #b{0} damage.
Receive #b{0}% more damage from #yAttacks. At the start of its turn, takes #b{0} damage.

CorruptTheSpire:AstralCore.NAME: Astral Core
DESCRIPTIONS: For every #b{0} damage this enemy takes, it gains #b{1} #yStrength. At the end of this enemy''s turn, if it has positive #yStrength, it loses #b{2} Strength.

CorruptTheSpire:AstralCoreCounter.NAME: Astral Core Counter
DESCRIPTIONS: After taking #b{0} more damage, #yAstral #yCore will trigger.

CorruptTheSpire:EldritchGrasp.NAME: Eldritch Grasp
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each round, apply #b{0} #yConstricted.

CorruptTheSpire:UnnaturalOrder.NAME: Unnatural Order
DESCRIPTIONS: #yPoison gains all the benefits of #yAbysstouched. NL Convert all #yAbysstouched to #yPoison. NL When you apply #yPoison or #yAbysstouched, apply #b{0} more.

CorruptTheSpire:DelayedNoDraw.NAME: Delayed No Draw
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, after you draw your initial cards, gain #yNo #yDraw.

CorruptTheSpire:ThoughtStealer.NAME: Thought Stealer
DESCRIPTIONS: Gains a charge for every card drawn past your first #b{0} each turn. At #b{1} charges, ALL enemies gain #b{2} #yStrength.

CorruptTheSpire:SpacetimeMastery.NAME: Spacetime Mastery
DESCRIPTIONS: Rotates between gaining #b1 #yStrength for each attack played, card drawn, skill played, and energy gained during your turn.
Rotates between gaining #b1 #yStrength for each attack played, card drawn, skill played, and energy gained during your turn. #rTwo buffs will be active at once.

CorruptTheSpire:Wary.NAME: Wary
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play an #yAttack, gains #b{0} Strength.

CorruptTheSpire:Thoughtful.NAME: Thoughtful
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a card, gains #b{0} Strength.

CorruptTheSpire:Restless.NAME: Restless
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain an energy, gains #b{0} Strength.

CorruptTheSpire:Cleanse.NAME: Cleanse
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduce all debuffs by #b{0} at the end of each turn.
Wears off after this turn.

CorruptTheSpire:WarpAura.NAME: Warp Aura
DESCRIPTIONS: When this enemy takes #b{0} or more damage, add #b1 #yDazed to your discard pile.

CorruptTheSpire:TemporalFissure.NAME: Temporal Fissure
DESCRIPTIONS: When this enemy dies, #pMaster #pof #pTime #pand #pSpace gains #yCleanse #b{0} and you gain #yFrail #b{1}.

CorruptTheSpire:SpatialFissure.NAME: Spatial Fissure
DESCRIPTIONS: When this enemy dies, #pMaster #pof #pTime #pand #pSpace starts shuffling #b1 #yBurn into your draw pile at the end of each round and ALL enemies heal #b{0}.

CorruptTheSpire:WorldAblaze.NAME: World Ablaze
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each round, shuffle #b{0} #yBurn into your draw pile.

CorruptTheSpire:ProtectiveMaw.NAME: Protective Maw
DESCRIPTIONS: Takes #b{0}% less damage. Killing #yLesser #yDevourers will reduce this protection.

CorruptTheSpire:FetidBody.NAME: Fetid Body
DESCRIPTIONS: For every #b{0} damage this enemy takes, shuffle #b1 #ySlimed into your draw pile.
For every #b{0} damage this enemy takes, add #b1 #ySlimed to the top of your draw pile.

CorruptTheSpire:FieryDemise.NAME: Fiery Demise
DESCRIPTIONS: On death, shuffles #b{0} #yBurn into your draw pile.

CorruptTheSpire:HandOfTheAbyss.NAME: Hand of the Abyss
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you deal unblocked attack damage, apply #b{0} #yAbysstouched.

CorruptTheSpire:Pressure.NAME: Pressure
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a card, it costs #b1 more this turn. If you keep a card in your hand without #yRetaining it, it costs #b1 more next turn.

CorruptTheSpire:ImpendingDoom.NAME: Impending Doom
DESCRIPTIONS: When brought to half HP, applies #b{0} #yVulnerable and loses this at the end of its next turn.

CorruptTheSpire:TemporaryHex.NAME: Temporary Hex
DESCRIPTIONS: This turn, whenever you play a #ynon-Attack card, shuffle #b1 #yDazed into your draw pile.
For the next #b{0} turns, whenever you play a #ynon-Attack card, shuffle #b1 #yDazed into your draw pile.

CorruptTheSpire:PermanentDrawReduction.NAME: Draw
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, draw #b{0} less card.
At the start of your turn, draw #b{0} less cards.

CorruptTheSpire:TemporaryConfusion.NAME: Temporary Confusion
DESCRIPTIONS: This turn, whenever you draw a card, randomize its cost.

CorruptTheSpire:Boon.NAME: Boon
DESCRIPTIONS: After playing #b{0} #yBoons, gain #yCelestial #yMight.

CorruptTheSpire:CelestialMight.NAME: Celestial Might
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain 5 #yTemporary #yHP and deal damage to ALL enemies equal to half the floor number.

CorruptTheSpire:InfernalBargain.NAME: Infernal Bargain
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, choose one:
NL Gain {0} Block.
NL Gain {0} Strength.
NL Draw {0} cards.
NL Take {0} damage at the end of your turn.
